title: Unused "C" import is not a compiler error
body:
Acknowledging that the "C" pseudo-package is different than most, I wanted to bring up that this code compiles while it might not be expected to:

```go
package main

import "C"

func main() {}
```

If nothing else, this is an inconsistency and others can decide if it is worth "fixing" (if that decision hasn't already been made).
